pr_title: Move gpx test from GraphHopperWebIT to RouteResourceTest

timeline.message: Make GH#export work for POST requests

timeline.bodyText: This wasn't private before but should be now problem to do so as there is a setter anyway
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.bodyText: Had to add a setter here, since we are now no longer testing this in the same package, do you think thats ok?
timeline.author: easbar
easbar

timeline.bodyText: I'm happy about every test we can remove here, see #1986.
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.bodyText: This was Bug2: For GET a missing gpx.millis would give null, but for POST it would be an empty String.
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.bodyText: Not handling NumberFormatException gave a misleading error message.
timeline.author: easbar
easbar

timeline.bodyText: We could also remove maxunzipped length here since we are not testing it anyway, but we might need it for some other tests in GraphHopperWebIT (but then we can still add it -> removed it here :))
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.message: Remove max unzipped length from test
Update now that gpx for post is gone

timeline.bodyText: Yes, this would be probably a good idea.
timeline.author: karussell
